contents.item: It has been noticed that since the year 2005, Istanbul has become a hot-spot for transplant of hair. Many foreigners are visiting Istanbul for medical tourism because the cost of surgeries and surgeons is more reasonable and affordable than other European countries. It is interesting to note that if you happen to be a patient going to Istanbul you will be given many allowances such as free travel tickets.
